titleStmt.title: An euerlasting prognostication of the change of weather collected and compiled for the common vse and profit of all countrey men. By Kinki Abenezrah, a wandring Iew.
titleStmt.author: Abenezrah, Kinki.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date conjectured by and publisher's name supplied by STC.
Running title reads: The Iewes prognostication.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
